Uses of Class
org.writeforward.logger.MessageBuilder

  • Packages that use MessageBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.writeforward.logger  

    • Uses of MessageBuilder in org.writeforward.logger

      Methods in org.writeforward.logger that return MessageBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MessageBuilder Log.message(java.lang.String message)
      The starting point for logging a message that ends with .write().
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.withAdditionalMessage(java.lang.String message)
      The message in Log.Debug(String message) not to your liking? No problem append an additional message here after a new line.
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.withException(java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Have a throwable or exception you would like to log along side your message.
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.withLogger(java.lang.String logger)
      What logger should we use when logging this message? The logger that will be used will be with the name of string passed to this method.
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.withMarker(Marker marker)
      Add a SLF4J marker to this message.
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.withMarker(java.lang.String markerName)
      Add a SLF4J marker to this message.
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.withTimeStamp(java.time.Instant time)
      Sets the time.
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.withValue(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object data)
      Add a variable value to be logged along with your message.
